text: Yalho, Yahlo is an ancient town located in the eastern Bari region of Puntland, Somalia, about south of Bosasohttps://elevationmap.net/yalho- bossaso-so-1011185764http://so.geoview.info/yalho,1404229898n. Yalho is amongs the oldest towns in Bari Region, arguably it was founded in the 17th century. Yalho valley, stoppage point during flash floods which blocking travel flow from, to Bosaso ==Demographics== Residents of yalho mostly hail Dishiishe ==References== Category:Populated places in Bari, Somalia Category: Bosaso
title: Yalho
